updates: Added Break by Gen Feature to start a new box for each generation

Added Walking Wake, Iron Leaves, Vivillon patterns available in Pokémon GO and Hisuian Zorua family to the SV Boxes
Fixed Vivillon order in Home Boxes
Added Rowlet family to the SV Boxes
Added Oshawott family to the SV Boxes
Added Cyndaquil family to the SV Boxes
